data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the King's Castle.
A highly fortified tower, one of the tallest in the land, about 50 square feet wide and 300 meters in height. It is constructed with the finest Ethery Stone, which is grey with hints of black tar. Some cracks appear on the west side of the Tower after years of wear and tear.
There's a highly fortified tower and an ornate goblet here.
The guard is here.

You are carrying a crown.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the crown to the guard so that the guard can wear it.
data.mid_motivation: I will be sneaking out of the castle and disguising myself as a commoner while I wander about town.
data.long_motivation: I need to learn how the people in my kingdom truly feel about me, so that I can destroy my enemies and reward those who are loyal.
